Posts.Content: My port was placed under general anesthesia and removed without it. My surgeon used the port to sedate me before removing it.
Posts.Title: Has anyone been denied anasthesia when having a port placed?

Posts.Content: Look for a physical therapist who has been trained in lymphedema therapy. S/he will be able to show you the proper exercises. Also, google "manual lymphatic drainage." There is info on the internet that shows you how to do self massage to get rid of the excess fluid. It does help.
Posts.Title: What kind of exercise is helpful for lymphedema?
